message: Welcome to the quick and easy way to talk about the revolutionary story theory Dramatica. If you have no idea what this is, be sure to visit the site: http://dramatica.com

Quick update, you can now privately send messages. Just click Messages at the top, pick the person, and start your own secret conversation!  More here: http://blog.convore.com/post/4564081661/private-messages
Don't forget to "star" the comments that you find particularly useful. You can't really do anything with them yet, but hopefully down the road you'll be able to search based on that criteria.

The format here encourages short chat or Twitter-style conversations. For a more traditional format, please visit the official Dramatica forums located here: http://forums.screenplay.com/viewforum.php?f=28
